content.raw:
Definitely not intentional, thanks for catching that.

Doing this refactoring has been rather laborious, especially since I've been needing to merge in changes from `default` while also moving files around (which is how multiple copies of files have wound up happening).

Once `ign-common` default branch has stabilized a bit, I'll probably end up scrapping this branch and redoing this refactoring.
